name: Falling Fail
description:
Hi :D 

This is my game for WOWIE JAM 3.0!

QUESTIONS:

Is it an Infinite game ?

-no it has 5 levels.

Why does it fit the theme ?

-You always catch a color that you shouldn´t catch

and if u do this all the time you get a "GAME OVER" screen

but because failure is progress you get to the next level.

CONTROL:

Press ESC to pause the game (In browser version u must press esc when ur not in fullscreen mode) 

Use A and D to move.

BTW this is my first Jam !
